greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (1-4*x)/(1-x+x^2).
comment: Row sums of number triangle A117377.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,-1).
formula: a(n) = a(n-1) - a(n-2) for n>1. [_Philippe Deléham_, Nov 03 2008]
a(n) = (1+(-n mod 3))^(n mod 3)*(-1)^floor((n+2)/3). - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Aug 31 2014
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(1 - 4 x)/(1 - x + x^2), {x, 0, 200}], x] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jun 11 2011 *)
program: (MAGMA) [(1+(-n mod 3))^(n mod 3)*(-1)^Floor((n+2)/3) : n in [0..100]]; // _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Aug 31 2014
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Mar 10 2006
